page.title: 20Leisure Pursuits in Well
page.content: The following are some of the hobbies & interests enjoyed by people in Well:-amateur radio,music,antiques, fine arts,china painting,crochet, canaries,chess,dressmaking,gardening, homing pigeons,home improvements,local history,lace making,needlework, photography,woodwork,stamps. {Outdoor active sport} - golf,horse riding, hunting,show jumping,cricket, bowls, clay pigeon shooting,tennis. {Indoor active sport-}badminton,snooke{ {Clubs}- Young Farmers, Pony, W.I. {Popular Activities at the Well Ox {Public House-Darts}a 9 man team competes in the Milbank Villages Darts League.Matches Mon.evenings home/away on alternate weeks. {Quiz}- 20 question quiz Thurs.evenings weekly.Participants (4 per table) pay 25p to enter. This report was compiled by Well & Snape W.I.
